scripts.publish:patch: yarn run doc && git commit -am 'Update docs' && yarn run build && npm version patch && git push origin master && git push origin --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:minor: yarn run doc && git commit -am 'Update docs' && yarn run build && npm version minor && git push origin master && git push origin --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:major: yarn run doc && git commit -am 'Update docs' && yarn run build && npm version major && git push origin master && git push origin --tags && npm publish --access=public
